Class Queen

java.lang.Object
ChessPiece
Queen
public class Queen extends ChessPiece
Queen Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice. - Implemented - The ability to move up,down,left,right,diagonally - Takes into consideration if other pieces are in its path
